text: was a Japanese politician. He served four terms as mayor of Nagasaki from 1979 to 1995. He has publicly made controversial statements about the responsibility of Japan and its then-reigning Emperor for World War II. He survived an assassination attempt in 1990. On October 31, 2014, Motoshima died at the age of 92 in Nagasaki, Japan from natural causes. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Japanese mayors Category:People from Nagasaki Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
